channel.title: race detector on Go设计实现内幕
channel.description: Recent content in race detector on Go设计实现内幕

item.title: a race detector unfurled
item.description: Let’s Summarize # Talk by Kavya Joshi. Race detectors are seriously cool tools that make writing race-free concurrent code easy — they detect the ever so elusive race conditions in a program. The Go race detector is one such tool that ships with Go, thereby making the magic of race detection trivially accessible to you and me. This talk will present the subtleties of race detection and explore how the Go race detector does it.

item.title: race detector with thread sanitizer
item.description: Let’s Summarize # 这篇文章只大致描述了如何使用race detector（-race）以及大致的实现原理，这篇文章也参考了上面Kavya Joshi的分享，可以直接看上面的视频来详细的了解race detector是如何实现的。 Source Analysis # References # https://medium.com/a-journey-with-go/go-race-detector-with-threadsanitizer-8e497f9e42db
